title: PRO-X Stainless Steel 15 in. Basting Spoon
description: Designed with professional chefs in mind, this PRO-X cookware line is made of high-grade stainless steel and designed for high functionality in the kitchen. The PRO-X 15 in. basting spoon has an extra long handle and is 100 percent solid 18/10 stainless steel from top to bottom. Plus, it makes an excellent cooking tool for outdoor grilling.Extra long handle makes it easy for you to grip and to use over a large potSpoon bowl catches liquids with easeLoop at edge of handle prevents utensil from sliding inside a pot and provides the option to hang when storedDishwasher safe
